Class ValidationHelper

java.lang.Object
utils.validation.ValidationHelper
public class ValidationHelper extends Object
Utility class for input validation. Provides validation methods for email, user IDs, and common input constraints.
Since:
2025-11-16
Version:
1.0
Author:
NTU SC2002 Group

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static final String

    STAFF_ID_PATTERN
    Regular expression pattern for staff ID validation (e.g., sng001)
    private static final String
    STUDENT_ID_PATTERN
    Regular expression pattern for student ID validation (e.g., U2310001A)

  • Method Details

    • validateEmail

      public static void validateEmail(String email)
      Validates an email address format.
      Parameters:
      email - The email to validate
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if email is invalid

    • validateNotEmpty

      public static void validateNotEmpty(String value, String fieldName)
      Validates that a string value is not empty.
      Parameters:
      value - The value to validate
      fieldName - The name of the field (for error message)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if value is null or empty

    • validateRange

      public static void validateRange(int value, int min, int max, String fieldName)
      Validates that an integer value is within a specified range.
      Parameters:
      value - The value to validate
      min - Minimum allowed value (inclusive)
      max - Maximum allowed value (inclusive)
      fieldName - The name of the field (for error message)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if value is out of range

    • validateUserID

      public static void validateUserID(String userID, UserType userType)
      Validates a user ID based on user type. Each user type has specific format requirements.
      Parameters:
      userID - The user ID to validate
      userType - The type of user
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if user ID format is invalid
